item.title: SpaceX Set To Bag $2B Government Funding To Develop Golden Dome Satellites: Report
item.description: SpaceX is also expected to play a major role in two other Pentagon projects involving satellites.

item.title: Why Is Ingersoll-Rand Stock Falling Premarket Today?
item.description: The company forecast adjusted earnings of $3.25 to $3.31 per share, while analysts expect it to post earnings of $3.36 per share.

item.title: Retail Software Firm SPS Commerce Faces Record Rout On Outlook Cut
item.description: CEO Chad Collins flags global trade and economic uncertainty as a factor in the soft uptake of the company's retail management software.

item.title: Why Cloudflare Stock Is Jumping Nearly 9% In Premarket
item.description: CEO Matthew Prince said revenue growth accelerated for the second consecutive quarter to 31% year-over-year.

item.title: Why Is Coinbase Stock Gaining Premarket Today?
item.description: The company reported quarterly revenue of $1.87 billion for the three months ended Sept. 30, while analysts expected it to post revenue of $1.81 billi...
